item.title: Welcome to Skype Classic Website Revision 3
item.description:
Welcome to revision 3 of the Skype Classic Website section!
New functionality The entire section has been reworked: the iframe has been reworked Now you can leave a friend a link to the exact page you need, and not the entire site as a whole Each section page has its own icon in the title Each page of the section has a sound when entering. Keep this in mind when accessing the site late at night. Removed outdated sections of the site New thanks window News: learn about the new functionality of the skype classic section and theme Skype Lite client 1.88 for Android Selecting a Profile Design Setting a custom profile background (temporarily only for “honored users”, in the future it may be available to everyone)
